statements: SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_solutions;
SELECT id, title FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, solution FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE title LIKE 'Connection %';
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_solutions ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, best_practice FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE best_practice IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, solution FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE best_practice ILIKE '%hardware%';
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_solutions ORDER BY title ASC, solution DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE solution IS NOT NULL AND best_practice LIKE '%software%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT best_practice FROM troubleshooting_solutions;
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_solutions;
SELECT title, category FROM troubleshooting_solutions WHERE solution_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT practice_name, steps FROM best_practices ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
